title: I have a crying problem
body:
It's really bugging me to no end.

I used to be a strong, independent individual who rarely cried. Ever. But, a series of events a few months ago made me very, very sad, and now it's a good day if I don't cry at all. I don't know how to stop, and it's so habitual now that I find it difficult sleeping without crying. What the hell do I do?
